body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear, Mini Dash Cam 1080P Full HD with 32GB SD Card, 2.45 inch IPS Screen, 2 Mounting Ways, Night Vision, WDR, Accident Lock, Loop Recording, Parking Monitor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 33 mins
features: 🎁【MINI DASH CAM FRONT AND REAR】 - This mini and compact dash cam won't obscure your view. It comes with a 170 wide-angle 1080P front camera and a 720P HD waterproof rear camera that captures all three lanes of the road. Meanwhile, the IPS display and WDR function make video recording more vivid, colorful and clear.

🎁【32GB CARD INCLUDED & TWO MOUNTING WAYS】 - In order to allow you to use the dash cam more quickly, we provide a 32gb SD card, you do not need to buy this card additionally. It is plug and play, very convenient. Two kinds of brackets are included. The suction cup allows flexible placement of the dash cam, while the 3M bracket stabilises the position of the dash cam.

🎁【LOOP RECORDING & ACCIDENT LOCK】 - The loop recording function makes the newly recorded video will overwrite the oldest video when sd card is full. Built-in G-Sensor, the video will be automatically locked and retained without being overwritten when the car is hit. Or you can, by pressing the lock button, keep the video you want.

🎁【SUPER NIGHT VISION & PARKING MONITOR】- The WDR function automatically adjusts the brightness of the light. Weakens the strong light and improves the low light. The dash cam can clearly capture the road conditions in the night. If the parking monitor function is turned on and the car is hit or scratched, the dash cam will automatically sense and record a short video.

🎁【EASY INSTALLATION & ALL IN ONE DESIGN】- After collecting all the accessories for installing the dashcam, we have added a crowbar and cable clips to help you install the dash cam better and faster, and even a novice can easily set up and install. In addition to the basic functions, the dash cam has more features like Voice Recording, Photo Function and so on.

📧【LIFETIME WARRANTY & RELIABLE CUSTOMER CARE】- We offer LIFETIME WARRANTY including professional after-sales team who respond 24/7 online, replacement parts or 30 days full refund. If there is any problem or suggestions with the dash cam front and rear, please feel free to contact with us. We will always be here for you.
body.description: Take You into Safe Driving Why Choose DKK? We hope that our dash cam can provide an extra protection for your car. It can get you out of trouble when you need evidence.When you travel by car, it captures the scenery along the way for you.Whether it's design, functionality, accessories, we are committed to creating the highest quality dash cams. Our dash cam is not only easy to use, but also helps you to clearly record your driving situation and beautiful journey. Specification: Resolution: 1080P (Front)+720P(Rear) Display: 2.45''IPS Screen Video Format: MOV Picture Format: JPG External power supply: DC 5V / 1.5A Internal Power:Built-in Li-ion Battery Operating Temperature : 14°F～122°F

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NOTE: -32GB SD card is inserted in the camera. Please Format SD Card firstly: Find the option of “Format” in dashcam and click “OK” button. - Please Remain plugged in: Please always keep the camera plugged into the car's cigarette lighter. The internal battery has a small capacity and is used for backup power only. - Screen Saver Function: To make the camera do not give any visual discomfort. The screen will go black but still recording after 1 minute by default. The flashing blue light means it is recording. If you want the screen on, just turn to menu and turn off "Screen Saver" function. -Not Wireless: The dash cam does not support an App to view playback. It supports viewing playback on the camera itself or computer. -Take Off Protective Film: Please take off the protective film of the lens and screen to ensure that the video is clearly displayed.

ALL IN ONE - Package Included 1 *Dash Cam Front & Rear1 *32GB SD Card1*11.48 ft Car Charger1 * 1.64 ft Mini USB Cable1 *18 ft Rear Cable1 * Adhesive Mounting1 * Suction Cup1 * Crowbar4 * Cable Clips1 * User Manual Take You into Safe Driving Why Choose DKK? We hope that our dash cam can provide an extra protection for your car. It can get you out of trouble when you need evidence.When you travel by car, it captures the scenery along the way for you.Whether it's design, functionality, accessories, we are committed to creating the highest quality dash cams. Our dash cam is not only easy to use, but also helps you to clearly record your driving situation and beautiful journey. Specification: Resolution: 1080P (Front)+720P(Rear) Display: 2.45''IPS Screen Video Format: MOV Picture Format: JPG External power supply: DC 5V / 1.5A Internal Power:Built-in Li-ion Battery Operating Temperature : 14°F～122°F

IPS Screen & Advanced Sensor With IPS screen, F2.0 aperture,170° wide-angle lens, this dash cam front and rear captures clear images and details even in the night. The front and back of car are recorded clearly to give you double protection. WDR - Wide Dynamic Range Turn on to optimize video quality of dash cam front and rear with wider light range and image details. Even in cloudy days or at night you can clearly see the license plate. Loop Recording & Accident Lock Loop recording will automatically and continuously record the videos. G-sensor will detect significant or sudden shock and movement and keeps them as evidence.

Rear Camera Waterproof The rear camera supports mounting on the rear window or above the number plate. The rear camera is water resistant, so you don't have to worry about the rear camera mounted on the license plate being damaged by rain. Optional Mounting The suction cup allows flexible placement of the dash cam front and rear, while the 3M bracket stabilises the position. The addition of a stand up plate at the bottom of the suction cup enhances the stability of the suction cups and the camera. Parking Monitoring It's used to protect your car after parking. With this parking monitor function on, when dash cam front and rear detects collision, it will automatically turn on and record it. (Additional kit required if you want 24H to monitor).

Front Camera Installation Attach to the windshield with a suction cup, with the help of included blue crowbar or cable clips , run wire of car charger inside weatherstrip and headliners and then plug into the cigarette lighter socket. Rear Camera Installation Plug the rear camera into the AV port on the front camera tightly, carefully run the wire of rear cam and hide it under the trim. Mount it on the rear window inside the car (with double-sided adhesive pad) or above the number plate outside the car (with screws).

M08 Q05 Camera Type Front and Inside Front and Rear Screen Size 1.5 Inch 2.45 Inch Video Resolution Front:1080P Interior:1080P Front: 1080P Rear:720P 32GB SD Card Included Included Lens Angle Front: 170° Interior:140° Front: 170° Rear: 140° IR Night Vision Interior Camera N/A Voice Recording ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Camera have great video quality, works great until a few months ago. I bought this dash cam in mid March of 2023, after a few months of using it, the camera no longer retain the settings and randomly restart and constantly goes into screen saver mode. I try adjusting and resetting it back to default but it still not retaining the settings. Since I was past the amazon return period, I contacted the seller and seller was quick to respond with help and troubleshooting. The issue was not resolved so seller offer to send me a new one instead. Definitely worth getting, good camera, mine was just maybe defected some how. Overall this is a great camera for the price. Would definitely recommend it due to seller great customer service and standing by their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great video quality
reviews.reviewText: I installed this about 5 weeks ago and it's working excellent so far. The hardest part of the installation was fussing to get the wires tucked in behind the door panel trim. It comes with a tool, it's just a tedious step. I installed both the front and rear cameras but you can do just the front. There is the option of recording both audio and video. Mine is set to video only - not sure if this saves recording space.To view the footage, I removed the front camera (disconnect the cords and slide it off the stand - no need to remove the camera holder). It comes with a USB cable that connected directly to my computer which had no problem recognizing the files or playing the video clips. It opens with two folders - front camera and rear camera. Each folder has several 3-minute video clips. They're named with the date and time (be sure to set the date and time when you install it so you can find videos later!) I wanted to check out some footage but I drove for an hour afterwards. I was worried it had been overwritten from the loop recording mechanism. But it was there - about midway through the list of available files, nowhere near being overwritten. I didn't make any changes to the USB. If you're worried about how long it will hold on to recordings, I recommend just getting it and testing it out before deciding what to do.By the way - the quality of the videos is great!Cons - I can't properly install my sun visor now because the camera is in the way :/ And the screen on the camera itself is too tiny to be of use. It's good for setting up and making sure it's recording the area you want, then it's better to just let it go black so it's not a distraction anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good for the price
reviews.reviewText: works pretty well. instructions are a little off/ example where it says press button to lock video, you actually have to press it once to turn screen back on then again to lock video.does accept up to 64gb card to get twice as much video. it comes with a 32gb card that holds about 3 hrs video. i tried a 128 and it only held 6.5 hrs.. put in a 64gb and it says it has 7hrs of space so that seems best.overall pretty good product and very good for the price. easy to use and picture is decent.picture is good, not great. extra rear camera has pretty low quality but it works. push some buttons and have split screen or switch screen entirely to other camera, good features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dash cam!
reviews.reviewText: I love this dash cam. The best feature is the rear camera video displaying on the front camera screen. Set up and installation were very easy (I didn’t even read the instructions tbh) and I love that it records over old footage. No maintenance required!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install
reviews.reviewText: Camera was easy to install for me. Button functions are not very user friendly when it comes to navigating to what you want to select, but gets easier the more you use it. I do want to point out that this device will NOT hold a charge and has to remain plugged in. Although my car will allow that while not running, I'm sure it cannot be easy on my battery. I like to leave the camera on over night for the motion detection function seeing as though there has been a major uptick in vehicle burglaries around my area. So I am giving 3 stars mainly for that reason because I do recall one of the descriptions, and selling points, was that this device can hold a charge. If my device is defective and this company is willing to replace it, I am more than willing to change my review.All in all this was a good purchase considering the price and the quality of the video/photos. The suction cup is really good as well, hasn't fallen off once
